review: Don't waste your time with a Roku Stick, just grab a Fire Stick.I had problems with this stick just outside the 30 day exchange period, and Roku support was a complete joke. I wasted an entire hour of my lunch break trying to convince a customer service agent that the unit is clearly defective. Every morning, it is completely locked up, unresponsive. Customer service first tried getting rid of me by just offering a free HDMI extender and blamed the Wifi Signal. Then after I told him why it couldn't be wifi signal (I had a signal analytics app and had it in the same room at one point, and of course, my Kindle Fire Stick worked in the same location flawlessly), the agent then proceeded to try and convince me the issue was the batteries on the remote before finally hanging up on me at the 1 hour mark.The interface of the Roku stick sucks, the device is slow and laggy compared to the Fire Stick, the apps have a clunky and outdated look, the only real reason you'd own it is if you were really committed to having VUDU. It would have been maybe 3 stars had the company actually stood by their product.
